params._ERC20: address of the ERC20 token contract
params._amount: amount of the ERC20 token to be deposited
params._data: information to be interpreted by L2

returns._0: hash of input generated by deposit

erc20Withdrawal(bytes).details: can only be called by the Rollups contract

erc20Deposit(address,uint256,bytes).notice: deposit an amount of a generic ERC20 token in the portal and create tokens in L2

erc20Withdrawal(bytes).notice: withdraw an amount of a generic ERC20 token from the portal
